abstract: Shareholders opposed to Hertz’s deal to take over the Dollar Thrifty Automotive Group have filed a lawsuit seeking to halt the transaction and accused Goldman Sachs of working on both sides of the deal.
snippet: Shareholders opposed to Hertz’s deal to take over the Dollar Thrifty Automotive Group have filed a lawsuit seeking to halt the transaction and accused Goldman Sachs of working on both sides of the deal.
lead_paragraph: 7:33 p.m. | Updated with Dollar Thrifty’s response.

headline.main: Lawsuit Seeks to Halt Hertz’s Deal for Dollar
